moveId1.name: Absorb
moveId1.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moveId2.name: Acid
moveId2.description: The opposing team is attacked with a spray of harsh acid. The acid may also lower the targets' Sp. Def stats.

moveId3.name: Acid Armor
moveId3.description: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply raising its Defense stat.

moveId4.name: Agility
moveId4.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

moveId5.name: Amnesia
moveId5.description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

moveId6.name: Aurora Beam
moveId6.description: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

moveId7.name: Barrage
moveId7.description: Round objects are hurled at the target to strike two to five times in a row.

moveId8.name: Barrier
moveId8.description: The user throws up a sturdy wall that sharply raises its Defense stat.

moveId9.name: Bide
moveId9.description: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.

moveId10.name: Bind
moveId10.description: Things such as long bodies or tentacles are used to bind and squeeze the target for four to five turns.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId11.name: Bite
moveId11.description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may make the target flinch.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.
30% chance to make the foe Flinch.

moveId12.name: Blizzard
moveId12.description: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike the opposing team. It may also freeze them solid.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId13.name: Body Slam
moveId13.description: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. It may also leave the target with paralysis.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId14.name: Bone Club
moveId14.description: The user clubs the target with a bone. It may also make the target flinch.

moveId15.name: Bonemerang
moveId15.description: The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops to hit the target twice, coming and going.

moveId16.name: Bubble
moveId16.description: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing team. It may also lower the targets' Speed stats.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId17.name: Bubble Beam
moveId17.description: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the opposing team. It may also lower their Speed stats.

moveId18.name: Clamp
moveId18.description: The target is clamped and squeezed by the user's very thick and sturdy shell for four to five turns.

moveId19.name: Comet Punch
moveId19.description: The target is hit with a flurry of punches that strike two to five times in a row.

moveId20.name: Confuse Ray
moveId20.description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

moveId21.name: Confusion
moveId21.description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the target confused.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId22.name: Constrict
moveId22.description: The target is attacked with long, creeping tentacles or vines. It may also lower the target's Speed stat.

moveId23.name: Conversion
moveId23.description: The user changes its type to become the same type as one of its moves.

moveId24.name: Counter
moveId24.description: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

moveId25.name: Crabhammer
moveId25.description: The target is hammered with a large pincer. Critical hits land more easily.

moveId26.name: Cut
moveId26.description: The target is cut with a scythe or a claw. It can also be used to cut down thin trees.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId27.name: Defense Curl
moveId27.description: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.

moveId28.name: Dig
moveId28.description: The user burrows, then attacks on the second turn. It can also be used to exit dungeons.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.
Can hit Pokémon in the semi-invulnerable turn of Dig.

moveId29.name: Disable
moveId29.description: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.

moveId30.name: Dizzy Punch
moveId30.description: The target is hit with rhythmically launched punches that may also leave it confused.

moveId31.name: Double Kick
moveId31.description: The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.

moveId32.name: Double Slap
moveId32.description: The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

moveId33.name: Double Team
moveId33.description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

moveId34.name: Double-Edge
moveId34.description: A reckless, life-risking tackle. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId35.name: Dragon Rage
moveId35.description: This attack hits the target with a shock wave of pure rage. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId36.name: Dream Eater
moveId36.description: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal the user's HP.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId37.name: Drill Peck
moveId37.description: A corkscrewing attack with the sharp beak acting as a drill.

moveId38.name: Earthquake
moveId38.description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes those around it.

moveId39.name: Egg Bomb
moveId39.description: A large egg is hurled at the target with maximum force to inflict damage.

moveId40.name: Ember
moveId40.description: The target is attacked with small flames. It may also leave the target with a burn.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId41.name: Explosion
moveId41.description: The user explodes to inflict damage on those around it. The user faints upon using this move.

moveId42.name: Fire Blast
moveId42.description: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId43.name: Fire Punch
moveId43.description: The target is punched with a fiery fist. It may also leave the target with a burn.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId44.name: Fire Spin
moveId44.description: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId45.name: Fissure
moveId45.description: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target instantly faints if it hits.

moveId46.name: Flamethrower
moveId46.description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId47.name: Flash
moveId47.description: The user flashes a bright light that cuts the target's accuracy. It can also be used to illuminate caves.
notes: Can be reflected by Magic Coat.
Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId48.name: Fly
moveId48.description: The user soars, then strikes its target on the second turn. It can also be used for flying to any familiar town.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId49.name: Focus Energy
moveId49.description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

moveId50.name: Fury Attack
moveId50.description: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.

moveId51.name: Fury Swipes
moveId51.description: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes for two to five times in quick succession.

moveId52.name: Glare
moveId52.description: The user intimidates the target with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis.

moveId53.name: Growl
moveId53.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.
notes: Can be reflected by Magic Coat.
Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId54.name: Growth
moveId54.description: The user's body grows all at once, raising the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

moveId55.name: Guillotine
moveId55.description: A vicious, tearing attack with big pincers. The target will faint instantly if this attack hits.

moveId56.name: Gust
moveId56.description: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.
Does 2x damage to Pokémon in the semi-invulnerable turn of Fly and Bounce.

moveId57.name: Harden
moveId57.description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

moveId58.name: Haze
moveId58.description: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

moveId59.name: Headbutt
moveId59.description: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. It may also make the target flinch.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.
30% chance to make the foe Flinch.

moveId60.name: High Jump Kick
moveId60.description: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.

moveId61.name: Horn Attack
moveId61.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

moveId62.name: Horn Drill
moveId62.description: The user stabs the target with a horn that rotates like a drill. If it hits, the target faints instantly.

moveId63.name: Hydro Pump
moveId63.description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId64.name: Hyper Beam
moveId64.description: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user must rest on the next turn to regain its energy.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId65.name: Hyper Fang
moveId65.description: The user bites hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. It may also make the target flinch.

moveId66.name: Hypnosis
moveId66.description: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

moveId67.name: Ice Beam
moveId67.description: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It may also freeze the target solid.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId68.name: Ice Punch
moveId68.description: The target is punched with an icy fist. It may also leave the target frozen.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId69.name: Jump Kick
moveId69.description: The user jumps up high, then strikes with a kick. If the kick misses, the user hurts itself.

moveId70.name: Karate Chop
moveId70.description: The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical hits land more easily.

moveId71.name: Kinesis
moveId71.description: The user distracts the target by bending a spoon. It lowers the target's accuracy.

moveId72.name: Leech Life
moveId72.description: The user drains the target's blood. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moveId73.name: Leech Seed
moveId73.description: A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.
notes: Can be reflected by Magic Coat.
Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId74.name: Leer
moveId74.description: The user gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.
notes: Can be reflected by Magic Coat.
Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId75.name: Lick
moveId75.description: The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moveId76.name: Light Screen
moveId76.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from special attacks for five turns.

moveId77.name: Lovely Kiss
moveId77.description: With a scary face, the user tries to force a kiss on the target. If it succeeds, the target falls asleep.

moveId78.name: Low Kick
moveId78.description: A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over. It inflicts greater damage on heavier targets.

moveId79.name: Meditate
moveId79.description: The user meditates to awaken the power deep within its body and raise its Attack stat.

moveId80.name: Mega Drain
moveId80.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moveId81.name: Mega Kick
moveId81.description: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle-packed power.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId82.name: Mega Punch
moveId82.description: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId83.name: Metronome
moveId83.description: The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain into randomly using nearly any move.

moveId84.name: Mimic
moveId84.description: The user copies the target's last move. The move can be used during battle until the Pokémon is switched out.

moveId85.name: Minimize
moveId85.description: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness.

moveId86.name: Mirror Move
moveId86.description: The user counters the target by mimicking the target's last move.

moveId87.name: Mist
moveId87.description: The user cloaks its body with a white mist that prevents any of its stats from being cut for five turns.

moveId88.name: Night Shade
moveId88.description: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage matching the user's level.

moveId89.name: Pay Day
moveId89.description: Numerous coins are hurled at the target to inflict damage. Money is earned after the battle.

moveId90.name: Peck
moveId90.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

moveId91.name: Petal Dance
moveId91.description: The user attacks the target by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId92.name: Pin Missile
moveId92.description: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

moveId93.name: Poison Gas
moveId93.description: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the face of opposing Pokémon. It may poison those hit.

moveId94.name: Poison Powder
moveId94.description: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust on the target. It may poison the target.
notes: Can be reflected by Magic Coat.
Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId95.name: Poison Sting
moveId95.description: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target.

moveId96.name: Pound
moveId96.description: The target is physically pounded with a long tail or a foreleg, etc.

moveId97.name: Psybeam
moveId97.description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. It may also cause confusion.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId98.name: Psychic
moveId98.description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId99.name: Psywave
moveId99.description: The target is attacked with an odd psychic wave. The attack varies in intensity.

moveId100.name: Quick Attack
moveId100.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId101.name: Rage
moveId101.description: As long as this move is in use, the power of rage raises the Attack stat each time the user is hit in battle.

moveId102.name: Razor Leaf
moveId102.description: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing team. Critical hits land more easily.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId103.name: Razor Wind
moveId103.description: A two-turn attack. Blades of wind hit opposing Pokémon on the second turn. Critical hits land more easily.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId104.name: Recover
moveId104.description: Restoring its own cells, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP.

moveId105.name: Reflect
moveId105.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from physical attacks for five turns.

moveId106.name: Rest
moveId106.description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. It fully restores the user's HP and heals any status problem.
notes: 100% chance to Sleep the target for 2 turn(s).

moveId107.name: Roar
moveId107.description: The target is scared off and switched. In the wild, a battle against a single Pokémon ends.

moveId108.name: Rock Slide
moveId108.description: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing team to inflict damage. It may also make the targets flinch.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.
30% chance to make the foe Flinch.

moveId109.name: Rock Throw
moveId109.description: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.

moveId110.name: Rolling Kick
moveId110.description: The user lashes out with a quick, spinning kick. It may also make the target flinch.

moveId111.name: Sand Attack
moveId111.description: Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing its accuracy.

moveId112.name: Scratch
moveId112.description: Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId113.name: Screech
moveId113.description: An earsplitting screech harshly reduces the target's Defense stat.

moveId114.name: Seismic Toss
moveId114.description: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId115.name: Self-Destruct
moveId115.description: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

moveId116.name: Sharpen
moveId116.description: The user reduces its polygon count to make itself more jagged, raising the Attack stat.

moveId117.name: Sing
moveId117.description: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber.

moveId118.name: Skull Bash
moveId118.description: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense in the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId119.name: Sky Attack
moveId119.description: A second-turn attack move where critical hits land more easily. It may also make the target flinch.

moveId120.name: Slam
moveId120.description: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, etc., to inflict damage.

moveId121.name: Slash
moveId121.description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId122.name: Sleep Powder
moveId122.description: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target.
notes: Can be reflected by Magic Coat.
Can be copied by Mirror Move.
100% chance to Sleep the target 1-3 turn(s).

moveId123.name: Sludge
moveId123.description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. It may also poison the target.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId124.name: Smog
moveId124.description: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. It may also poison the target.

moveId125.name: Smokescreen
moveId125.description: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. It reduces the target's accuracy.
notes: Can be reflected by Magic Coat.
Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId126.name: Soft-Boiled
moveId126.description: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP. May also be used in the field to heal HP.

moveId127.name: Solar Beam
moveId127.description: A two-turn attack. The user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the second turn.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId128.name: Sonic Boom
moveId128.description: The target is hit with a destructive shock wave that always inflicts 20 HP damage.

moveId129.name: Spike Cannon
moveId129.description: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

moveId130.name: Splash
moveId130.description: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...

moveId131.name: Spore
moveId131.description: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.

moveId132.name: Stomp
moveId132.description: The target is stomped with a big foot. It may also make the target flinch.

moveId133.name: Strength
moveId133.description: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power. It can also be used to move heavy boulders.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId134.name: String Shot
moveId134.description: The targets are bound with silk blown from the user's mouth. This silk reduces the targets' Speed stat.
notes: Can be reflected by Magic Coat.
Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId135.name: Struggle
moveId135.description: An attack that is used in desperation only if the user has no PP. It also hurts the user slightly.

moveId136.name: Stun Spore
moveId136.description: The user scatters a cloud of paralyzing powder. It may leave the target with paralysis.
notes: Can be reflected by Magic Coat.
Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId137.name: Submission
moveId137.description: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. It also hurts the user slightly.

moveId138.name: Substitute
moveId138.description: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user's decoy.

moveId139.name: Super Fang
moveId139.description: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. It cuts the target's HP to half.

moveId140.name: Supersonic
moveId140.description: The user generates odd sound waves from its body. It may confuse the target.
notes: Can be reflected by Magic Coat.
Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId141.name: Surf
moveId141.description: It swamps the area around the user with a giant wave. It can also be used for crossing water.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.
Does 2x damage to Pokémon in the semi-invulnerable turn of Dive.

moveId142.name: Swift
moveId142.description: Star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing team. This attack never misses.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId143.name: Swords Dance
moveId143.description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. It sharply raises the user's Attack stat.

moveId144.name: Tackle
moveId144.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId145.name: Tail Whip
moveId145.description: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.
notes: Can be reflected by Magic Coat.
Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId146.name: Take Down
moveId146.description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. It also damages the user a little.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId147.name: Teleport
moveId147.description: Use it to flee from any wild Pokémon. It can also warp to the last Pokémon Center visited.

moveId148.name: Thrash
moveId148.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. It then becomes confused, however.

moveId149.name: Thunder
moveId149.description: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moveId150.name: Thunder Punch
moveId150.description: The target is punched with an electrified fist. It may also leave the target with paralysis.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId151.name: Thunder Shock
moveId151.description: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moveId152.name: Thunder Wave
moveId152.description: A weak electric charge is launched at the target. It causes paralysis if it hits.

moveId153.name: Thunderbolt
moveId153.description: A strong electric blast is loosed at the target. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moveId154.name: Toxic
moveId154.description: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

Can be copied by Mirror Move.
100% chance to Badly Poison the foe.
Will never miss if used by a Poison-type Pokémon.

moveId155.name: Transform
moveId155.description: The user transforms into a copy of the target right down to having the same move set.

moveId156.name: Tri Attack
moveId156.description: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze, or leave the target with paralysis.

moveId157.name: Twineedle
moveId157.description: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. It may also poison the target.

moveId158.name: Vine Whip
moveId158.description: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId159.name: Vise Grip
moveId159.description: The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides to inflict damage.

moveId160.name: Water Gun
moveId160.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId161.name: Waterfall
moveId161.description: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch. It can also be used to climb a waterfall.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.
20% chance to make the foe Flinch.

moveId162.name: Whirlwind
moveId162.description: The target is blown away and switched. In the wild, a battle against a single Pokémon ends.
notes: Can be reflected by Magic Coat.
Can be copied by Mirror Move.
Can hit Pokémon in the semi-invulnerable turn of Fly and Bounce.

moveId163.name: Wing Attack
moveId163.description: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId164.name: Withdraw
moveId164.description: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense stat.

moveId165.name: Wrap
moveId165.description: A long body or vines are used to wrap and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

moveId166.name: Aeroblast
moveId166.description: A vortex of air is shot at the target to inflict damage. Critical hits land more easily.

moveId167.name: Ancient Power
moveId167.description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. It may also raise all the user's stats at once.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId168.name: Attract
moveId168.description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
notes: Can be reflected by Magic Coat.
Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId169.name: Baton Pass
moveId169.description: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, passing along any stat changes.

moveId170.name: Beat Up
moveId170.description: The user gets all party Pokémon to attack the target. The more party Pokémon, the greater the number of attacks.

moveId171.name: Belly Drum
moveId171.description: The user maximizes its Attack stat in exchange for HP equal to half its max HP.

moveId172.name: Bone Rush
moveId172.description: The user strikes the target with a hard bone two to five times in a row.

moveId173.name: Charm
moveId173.description: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. The target's Attack is harshly lowered.
notes: Can be reflected by Magic Coat.
Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId174.name: Conversion 2
moveId174.description: The user changes its type to make itself resistant to the type of the attack the opponent used last.

moveId175.name: Cotton Spore
moveId175.description: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to the target, harshly reducing its Speed stat.

moveId176.name: Cross Chop
moveId176.description: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. Critical hits land more easily.

moveId177.name: Crunch
moveId177.description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId178.name: Curse
moveId178.description: A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all other types.

moveId179.name: Destiny Bond
moveId179.description: When this move is used, if the user faints, the Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints.

moveId180.name: Detect
moveId180.description: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moveId181.name: Dragon Breath
moveId181.description: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moveId182.name: Dynamic Punch
moveId182.description: The user punches the target with full, concentrated power. It confuses the target if it hits.
notes: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

moveId183.name: Encore

moveId184.name: Endure

moveId185.name: Extreme Speed

moveId556.description: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn. If used in succession, its chance of failing rises.

moveId557.name: Wild Charge
moveId557.description: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target. It also damages the user a little.

moveId558.name: Wonder Room
moveId558.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.

moveId559.name: Work Up
moveId559.description: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats increase.
